forest_plot.description: Forest plot with confidence intervals for all three pairwise comparisons

comparison_bar.description: Bar chart comparing effect size magnitudes with Cohen's conventions

boxplot_comparison.description: Three-model comparison box plot with individual data points

anova_summary.description: ANOVA F-statistic and η² visualization with thresholds

means_comparison.description: Means comparison with standard error bars

model_specific.description: Forest plot showing improvement for each model UID

model_size_comparison.description: Performance comparison by model size categories

effect_size_forest_plot.title: Effect Size Forest Plot with 95% Confidence Intervals
effect_size_forest_plot.description:
Forest plot showing Cohen's d effect sizes for all pairwise comparisons:
        - Baseline vs DPO-Synthetic: d = -0.040 [-0.271, 0.190]
        - Baseline vs DPO-Hybrid: d = 0.031 [-0.199, 0.261]
        - DPO-Synthetic vs DPO-Hybrid: d = 0.079 [-0.151, 0.309]
        All effect sizes are negligible (|d| < 0.2) with confidence intervals spanning zero.

effect_size_comparison.title: Effect Size Comparison Across Model Variants
effect_size_comparison.description:
Bar chart comparing absolute Cohen's d values:
        - Baseline vs DPO-Synthetic: |d| = 0.040
        - Baseline vs DPO-Hybrid: |d| = 0.031
        - DPO-Synthetic vs DPO-Hybrid: |d| = 0.079
        Horizontal lines show Cohen's thresholds: small (0.2), medium (0.5), large (0.8).
        All observed effects fall well below the small effect threshold.

model_comparison_boxplot.title: Model Performance Comparison
model_comparison_boxplot.description:
Box plot comparing overall score distributions:
        - Baseline: M = 0.574, SD = 0.260
        - DPO-Synthetic: M = 0.564, SD = 0.231
        - DPO-Hybrid: M = 0.581, SD = 0.201
        Box plots show median, quartiles, and outliers. Red diamonds indicate means.
        Substantial overlap between distributions indicates similar performance.

anova_summary.title: ANOVA Results Summary
anova_summary.description:
Two-panel plot showing ANOVA results:
        Left panel: F-statistic = 0.199 (well below typical significance threshold)
        Right panel: η² = 0.001 vs methodology threshold (0.06)
        Results indicate no meaningful differences between model variants.

means_comparison.title: Model Performance: Means with Standard Error
means_comparison.description:
Bar chart showing means with standard error bars:
        - Baseline: 0.574 ± 0.022
        - DPO-Synthetic: 0.564 ± 0.019
        - DPO-Hybrid: 0.581 ± 0.017
        Overlapping error bars confirm no significant differences between models.

methodology_validation.title: Methodology Validation: Predicted vs Actual Effect Sizes
methodology_validation.description:
Comparison of predicted versus actual effect sizes:
        Baseline vs DPO-Synthetic: Predicted d = 0.6, Actual d = 0.040
        Baseline vs DPO-Hybrid: Predicted d = 0.85, Actual d = 0.031
        DPO-Synthetic vs DPO-Hybrid: Predicted d = 0.4, Actual d = 0.079
        Large discrepancies indicate methodology validation failure.

model_specific_improvements.title: Model-Specific Improvement Forest Plot
model_specific_improvements.description:
Forest plot showing improvement rates for each model:
        Individual model improvements vs baseline across DPO-Synthetic and DPO-Hybrid variants.
        Models analyzed: ['M0001', 'M0002', 'M0003', 'M0005']
        Shows confidence intervals for improvement percentages by model UID.
        Key improvements: M0001: -3.39% (Synthetic); M0001: -3.50% (Hybrid); M0002: 12.45% (Synthetic)...

category_performance.title: Category Performance Comparison
category_performance.description:
Performance comparison across charity categories:
        Categories: ['healthcare_medical', 'education_youth', 'environmental', 'community_social']
        Shows mean performance for Baseline, DPO-Synthetic, and DPO-Hybrid by category.
        Error bars represent standard error of the mean.
        Category means: healthcare_medical: 0.604; education_youth: 0.525; environmental: 0.541; community_social: 0.568

model_size_comparison.title: Model Size Group Performance Comparison
model_size_comparison.description:
Performance comparison by model size groups:
        Small models: ['M0001', 'M0003', 'M0005']
        Medium models: ['M0002', 'M0004']  
        Large models: ['M0006', 'M0007']
        Shows aggregated performance within each size category.
        Size group means: small: 0.581; medium: 0.528
